Sentencas: Atmospheric plasma sprayed Mn1.0Co1.9Fe0.1O4 (MCF) coating is regarded as one of the excellent materials in mitigating Cr-evaporation in Crofer 22 APU ferritic steel during high-temperature operation in solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) conditions.
Titulo: Characterization of Plasma Sprayed Mn1.0Co1.9Fe0.1O4 Coating on Crofer 22 APU Interconnect for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Application

Sentencas: In this study, MCF-coated Crofer steel has been characterized by examining the cross-section of as-sprayed coating.
Titulo: Characterization of Plasma Sprayed Mn1.0Co1.9Fe0.1O4 Coating on Crofer 22 APU Interconnect for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Application

Sentencas: A network of micro-cracks and globular pores was seen in the cross-section analysis.
Titulo: Characterization of Plasma Sprayed Mn1.0Co1.9Fe0.1O4 Coating on Crofer 22 APU Interconnect for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Application

Sentencas: The porosity of as-sprayed MCF coating was 10.93 +/- 1.323%.
Titulo: Characterization of Plasma Sprayed Mn1.0Co1.9Fe0.1O4 Coating on Crofer 22 APU Interconnect for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Application

Sentencas: XRD data revealed alpha-Fe as the major phase in as-received Crofer steel and CoO as the major phase in MCF coating.
Titulo: Characterization of Plasma Sprayed Mn1.0Co1.9Fe0.1O4 Coating on Crofer 22 APU Interconnect for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Application

Sentencas: Micro-hardness measurements of MCF coating was 163.5 +/- 1.5 HV0.1N. The measured values revealed strong metallic interlocking between the coating and substrate.
Titulo: Characterization of Plasma Sprayed Mn1.0Co1.9Fe0.1O4 Coating on Crofer 22 APU Interconnect for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Application

Sentencas: Four-probe method employed on MCF coating showed a decrease in resistance as a function of temperature, indicating an increase in electrical conductivity.
Titulo: Characterization of Plasma Sprayed Mn1.0Co1.9Fe0.1O4 Coating on Crofer 22 APU Interconnect for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Application

Sentencas: The spinel coating on Crofer steel was found to be beneficial for SOFC operation.
Titulo: Characterization of Plasma Sprayed Mn1.0Co1.9Fe0.1O4 Coating on Crofer 22 APU Interconnect for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Application
